TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Mark_Alarie, title = Mark_Alarie, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Alarie} }

S.FORM: == Mark Alarie == 12 bulad 11 demiad, 1963 a mihca, Mark Alarie, miunduay. Mark Alarie nalecuhan i Phoenix, Arizona, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Mark Alarie unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u tabakiay ayaway mimaliay. Mark Alarie i 1986 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 18, namapili' tu nu Denver Nuggets putiput. kakuniza

== Mark Alarie == 12 bolad 11 demiad, 1963 a mihca, Mark Alarie, miondoay. Mark Alarie nalecohan i Phoenix, Arizona, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Mark Alarie ono syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, o tabakiay ayaway mimaliay. Mark Alarie i 1986 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ko owac ato silsil 18, namapili' to no Denver Noggets potipot. kakoniza
